name: HOWLING VISIONS
description:
CONTROLS

[WASD] or [ARROWS] - move

[1-9] - cast spells

GAMEPLAY

Move to the portal to advance levels

Collect 3 books to gain spells

Defeat or evade foes

Attack foes by moving into their space

Credits

Code and art by Neil Knauth

Music: Evol by Monplaisir

Based on Jeremiah Reid's Javascript Broughlike tutorial

Font based on m3x6 by Daniel Linssen

Palettes by Vinik, Polyducks, Grafxkid, Kerrie Lake, p-tux7, Windfallapples, Kirokaze, ENDESGA, WildLeoKnight, Starlane, and Nintendo

Special Thanks

Michael Brough

Loren Schmidt

OWCH
